content: This person appears to have been none other than Beddington, the famous forger and cracksman, who, with his brother, had only recently emerged from a five years' spell of penal servitude.
translations: ita:Questa persona sembra essere nientemeno che Beddington, il famoso falsario e scassinatore, il quale, insieme al fratello
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
